briefTitle: VIR-7831 for Inpatients With COVID-19 (An ACTIV-3/TICO Treatment Trial)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria: Refer to the master protocol (NCT04501978)

Exclusion Criteria: Refer to the master protocol (NCT04501978)

Additional Exclusion Criteria:

1. Pregnant women
2. Nursing mothers

In addition, prior to the initial futility assessment which is performed when approximately 150 participants have been enrolled on VIR-7831 and 150 on placebo, patients on highflow oxygen or non-invasive ventilation (category 5 of the pulmonary ordinal outcome) will be excluded. These patients may be eligible for the trial if the initial futility assessment is passed by this agent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Sustained Recovery
outcomeMeasures.description: Sustained recovery defined as being discharged from the index hospitalization, followed by being alive and home for 14 consecutive days prior to Day 90.

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With an Ordinal Outcome on Day 5
outcomeMeasures.description: Ordinal outcome with 7 mutually exclusive categories

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants Who Died From All Causes
Number of Participants With a Safety Outcome Through Day 5
outcomeMeasures.description: Death, SAE, clinical organ failure, serious infections, or Grade 3 or 4 event through Day 5

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a Safety Outcome Through Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Death, SAE, clinical organ failure, serious infections, or Grade 3 or 4 event through Day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With a Safety Outcome Through Day 90
outcomeMeasures.description: Death, SAE, clinical organ failure, serious infections through Day 90
